Who Forest.requires: ({YamlDisabled(key_preference)} AND |Who Forest Access Key|) OR ({YamlEnabled(key_preference)} AND |Progressive Area Access Key:1|)

Who Dump.requires: ({YamlDisabled(key_preference)} AND |Who Dump Access Key|) OR ({YamlEnabled(key_preference)} AND |Progressive Area Access Key:2|)

Who Lake.requires: ({YamlDisabled(key_preference)} AND |Who Lake Access Key|) OR ({YamlEnabled(key_preference)} AND |Progressive Area Access Key:3|)

Minefield.requires: |Rotten Egg Launcher| AND ((|Slime Shooter| AND |Rocket Spring|) OR |Grinch Copter|)

Outside Power Plant.requires: (|Rotten Egg Launcher| OR |Slime Shooter|) AND (|Grinch Copter| OR (|Octopus Climbing Device| AND |Slime Shooter| AND |Rocket Spring|))

Inside Power Plant.requires: |Rotten Egg Launcher| AND (|Grinch Copter| OR (|Octopus Climbing Device| AND |Slime Shooter| AND |Rocket Spring|)) AND {OptOne(Max)}
